attributes.action: Cover transgender people in the conversion therapy ban
attributes.additional_details: It is unequal to not cover transgender people, it is discriminatory and has no place in British society. Conversion therapy should not apply to any individual in society regardless of characteristic.
attributes.background: Ensure that Transgender people are protected from abhorrent conversion therapy tactics and are included in the conversion therapy ban.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
